import React, { useState } from 'react' import './LoginPopUp.css' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' const LoginPopUp = ({setShowLogin}) => { const [currState, setCurrState] = useState('Login') const [data, setData] = useState ({ name:"", email:"", password:"" }) const onChangeHandler = (event) => { const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value setData(data=>({...da})) } return (

{currState}

setShowLogin(false)} src={assets.cross_icon}>

By continuing, I agree to the terms of use & privacy policy

) } export default LoginPopUp
